birth_place.zh-cn: 河北省唐山市滦南县姚王庄镇
birth_place.en: Yaowangzhuang Town, Luannan County, Tangshan, Hebei Province

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官，公使外交衔。曾任外交部新闻司副司长、发言人，现任外交部边界与海洋事务司副司长。因其言论风格被视为“战狼外交”的代表人物。
description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China with the rank of minister. He formerly served as the deputy director-general and spokesperson of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and currently serves as the deputy director-general of the Department of Boundary and Ocean Affairs. His rhetorical style is considered representative of 'Wolf Warrior diplomacy'.

description.zh-cn: 赵立坚的妻子，民营企业家，在巴基斯坦伊斯兰堡经营中资企业，并开办了进出口贸易公司与家具生产厂。
description.en: Zhao Lijian's wife, a private entrepreneur who is the general manager of a Chinese-funded enterprise in Islamabad, Pakistan, and has established an import-export trading company and a furniture factory.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国外交部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国负责外交事务的政府部门。
description.en: The government department of the People's Republic of China responsible for foreign affairs.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国外交部边界与海洋事务司

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部边界与海洋事务司

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部内设机构，负责处理陆地、海洋边界相关外交事务。
description.en: An internal department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China, responsible for handling diplomatic affairs related to land and maritime boundaries.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交官，时任中华人民共和国外交部边界与海洋事务司司长。
description.en: Chinese diplomat, then Director-General of the Department of Boundary and Ocean Affairs of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国外交部新闻司

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部新闻司

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部内设机构，负责新闻发布、公共外交等工作。
description.en: An internal department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China, responsible for press releases, public diplomacy, etc.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交官，时任中华人民共和国外交部新闻司司长。
description.en: Chinese diplomat, then Director-General of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国外交部发言人

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部发言人

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部的官方发言人职位。
description.en: The official spokesperson position for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 一所位于长沙的大学，现已合并至中南大学。
description.en: A university in Changsha, now merged into Central South University.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国外交部亚洲司

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部亚洲司

nodes.id: 中国驻巴基斯坦大使馆

zh-cn: 中国驻巴基斯坦大使馆

description.zh-cn: 指中华人民共和国自习近平担任总书记以来，所采取的强硬、对抗性的外交政策风格。
description.en: Refers to the assertive and confrontational style of foreign policy adopted by the People's Republic of China since Xi Jinping became General Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 美国前国家安全顾问、前驻联合国大使。
description.en: Former U.S. National Security Advisor and former U.S. Ambassador to the United Nations.

description.zh-cn: 关于2019冠状病毒病起源、传播或特性的各种未经证实的理论。
description.en: Various unproven theories regarding the origin, spread, or characteristics of COVID-19.

description.zh-cn: 澳大利亚政治人物，时任澳大利亚总理。
description.en: Australian politician, then Prime Minister of Australia.

description.zh-cn: 赵立坚在推特发布一幅描绘澳大利亚士兵杀害阿富汗儿童的讽刺漫画，引发中澳外交争端。
description.en: An incident where Zhao Lijian posted a satirical cartoon on Twitter depicting an Australian soldier killing an Afghan child, sparking a diplomatic dispute between China and Australia.

description.zh-cn: 由乌合麒麟创作的讽刺漫画，描绘澳大利亚士兵在阿富汗的暴行。
description.en: A satirical cartoon created by Wuheqilin depicting the atrocities of Australian soldiers in Afghanistan.

description.zh-cn: 中国网络画家，以创作政治讽刺CG画作闻名。
description.en: A Chinese internet artist known for creating political satirical CG artworks.

nodes.id: 澳大利亚驻阿富汗军队非法杀戮

zh-cn: 澳大利亚驻阿富汗军队非法杀戮

description.zh-cn: 指澳大利亚特种部队在阿富汗战争期间对平民和囚犯犯下的一系列战争罪行。
description.en: Refers to a series of war crimes committed by Australian special forces against civilians and prisoners during the war in Afghanistan.

description.zh-cn: 赵立坚将一幅讽刺日本福岛核废水排放的画作《神奈氚冲浪里》在推特置顶，引发日本方面的抗议。
description.en: An incident where Zhao Lijian pinned a tweet with a cartoon named 'The Great Wave off Kanagawa with Tritium' satirizing Japan's Fukushima wastewater discharge, which led to protests from Japan.

description.zh-cn: 叙利亚摄影师。
description.en: Syrian photographer.

nodes.id: 乌克兰生物实验室阴谋论

zh-cn: 乌克兰生物实验室阴谋论

description.zh-cn: 关于美国在乌克兰运营生物武器实验室的阴谋论。
description.en: A conspiracy theory about the United States operating bioweapon laboratories in Ukraine.

description.zh-cn: 乌克兰政治家，时任乌克兰副总理。
description.en: Ukrainian politician, then Deputy Prime Minister of Ukraine.

nodes.id: 2022年3月上海市2019冠状病毒病聚集性疫情

zh-cn: 2022年3月上海市2019冠状病毒病聚集性疫情

description.zh-cn: 2022年春季在中国上海市爆发的大规模2019冠状病毒病疫情，导致全市范围内的严格封锁。
description.en: A large-scale COVID-19 outbreak in Shanghai, China, in the spring of 2022, which led to a city-wide strict lockdown.

location.zh-cn: 中国河北省唐山市滦南县
location.en: Luannan County, Tangshan, Hebei Province, China

description.zh-cn: 汤天如是赵立坚的妻子。
description.en: Tang Tianru is Zhao Lijian's wife.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国外交部
中华人民共和国外交部边界与海洋事务司

description.zh-cn: 赵立坚担任中华人民共和国外交部边界与海洋事务司副司长时，洪亮为司长。
description.en: When Zhao Lijian served as the Deputy Director-General of the Department of Boundary and Ocean Affairs of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Hong Liang was the Director-General.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国外交部
中华人民共和国外交部新闻司
中华人民共和国外交部发言人

description.zh-cn: 赵立坚是外交部第31任发言人。
description.en: Zhao Lijian was the 31st spokesperson for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 赵立坚担任中华人民共和国外交部新闻司副司长时，华春莹为司长。
description.en: When Zhao Lijian served as the Deputy Director-General of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Hua Chunying was the Director-General.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国外交部亚洲司

中华人民共和国外交部亚洲司

position.zh-cn: 科员、随员、三等秘书、二等秘书、副处长、一等秘书、处长
position.en: Staff Member, Attaché, Third Secretary, Second Secretary, Deputy Division Director, First Secretary, Division Director

relationships.target: 中国驻巴基斯坦大使馆

position.zh-cn: 随员、三等秘书、参赞、公使衔参赞

description.zh-cn: 赵立坚因其强硬的言论风格被广泛视为“战狼外交”的代表人物。
description.en: Due to his assertive rhetorical style, Zhao Lijian is widely regarded as a representative figure of 'Wolf Warrior diplomacy'.

description.zh-cn: 因赵立坚就新疆问题发表的推文，苏珊·赖斯指其为“耻辱的种族主义分子”，双方在推特上激烈交锋。
description.en: Over Zhao Lijian's tweets on the Xinjiang issue, Susan Rice called him a 'disgraceful racist,' leading to a fierce exchange between them on Twitter.

description.zh-cn: 赵立坚在推特上质疑2019冠状病毒病可能由美军带入武汉，推动了病毒源于美国的阴谋论。
description.en: On Twitter, Zhao Lijian questioned whether COVID-19 might have been brought to Wuhan by the U.S. military, promoting the conspiracy theory that the virus originated in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 就赵立坚散播病毒可能源于美军的阴谋论，美国政府召见中国驻美国大使表示交涉，批评其言论“危险且可笑”。
description.en: In response to Zhao Lijian spreading the conspiracy theory that the virus might have originated from the U.S. military, the U.S. government summoned the Chinese ambassador to the United States to make representations, criticizing his remarks as 'dangerous and ridiculous'.

description.zh-cn: 赵立坚在推特发布了由中国网络画家“乌合麒麟”创作的讽刺漫画《和平之师》，谴责澳大利亚军队在阿富汗的战争罪行，从而引发了此次外交事件。
description.en: Zhao Lijian posted the satirical cartoon 'Peace Force' by Chinese internet artist 'Wuheqilin' on Twitter, condemning the war crimes of the Australian military in Afghanistan, which triggered this diplomatic incident.

description.zh-cn: 澳大利亚总理斯科特·莫里森批评赵立坚发布的图片是“伪造的”和“令人反感的”，并要求中国政府道歉，将事件升级为外交争端。
description.en: Australian Prime Minister Scott Morrison criticized the image posted by Zhao Lijian as 'fake' and 'repugnant' and demanded an apology from the Chinese government, escalating the incident into a diplomatic dispute.

description.zh-cn: 乌合麒麟是讽刺漫画《和平之师》的创作者。
description.en: Wuheqilin is the creator of the satirical cartoon 'Peace Force'.

description.zh-cn: 赵立坚发布《和平之师》这幅画作是事件的直接导火索。
description.en: Zhao Lijian's posting of the artwork 'Peace Force' was the direct trigger for the incident.

relationships.target: 澳大利亚驻阿富汗军队非法杀戮

description.zh-cn: 赵立坚通过在推特发布讽刺漫画，公开谴责澳大利亚军队在阿富汗犯下的战争罪行。
description.en: By posting a satirical cartoon on Twitter, Zhao Lijian publicly condemned the war crimes committed by the Australian military in Afghanistan.

description.zh-cn: 赵立坚将一幅讽刺日本福岛核废水排放的画作在推特置顶，引发了此次事件。
description.en: Zhao Lijian triggered this incident by pinning a tweet with a cartoon satirizing Japan's Fukushima wastewater discharge.

description.zh-cn: 摄影师Ali Haj Suleiman澄清赵立坚在推特上发布的图片摄于叙利亚而非阿富汗，并指责赵扭曲事实，导致赵立坚删除了该推文。
description.en: Photographer Ali Haj Suleiman clarified that the photos posted by Zhao Lijian on Twitter were taken in Syria, not Afghanistan, and accused Zhao of distorting the facts, leading Zhao to delete the tweet.

relationships.target: 乌克兰生物实验室阴谋论

description.zh-cn: 赵立坚在记者会上多次指控美国在乌克兰开设生物实验室，推动了此阴谋论的传播。
description.en: At press conferences, Zhao Lijian repeatedly accused the United States of operating biological laboratories in Ukraine, promoting the spread of this conspiracy theory.

description.zh-cn: 乌克兰副总理伊琳娜·韦列舒克反驳了赵立坚关于美国向乌克兰援助武器会造成更多平民伤亡的言论，称其言论轻佻，配不上一个大国地位。
description.en: Ukrainian Deputy Prime Minister Iryna Vereshchuk refuted Zhao Lijian's claim that U.S. arms aid to Ukraine would cause more civilian casualties, calling his remarks frivolous and unworthy of a great power.

relationships.target: 2022年3月上海市2019冠状病毒病聚集性疫情

description.zh-cn: 赵立坚于2021年发表的“你们在抗疫期间生活在中国，就偷着乐吧”的言论，在2022年上海封城期间被网民广泛用于讽刺和批评当局的封控政策，引发巨大争议。
description.en: Zhao Lijian's 2021 remark, 'Living in China during this pandemic, you should just be secretly happy,' was widely used by netizens during the 2022 Shanghai lockdown to satirize and criticize the authorities' lockdown policies, causing significant controversy.
